s1.title: Introduction
s1.p: Any OS that can provide a J2SE environment could be a host to Jesktop and Avalon. That said, there are not many. Manufacturers of lightweight and RTOSs have a fixation for Personal Java on the KVM.

s1.title: Full blown
s1.p: Windows and Linux are supported already.

s1.title: For the Future
s1.p: AtheOS, QNX, VxWorks, Elate, (TODO). It kinda really depends on the availablity of J2SE for those platforms and Ant supporting them.
